title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple WordPress Plugin Vulnerabilities

sentences: Impact
titles: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple WordPress Plugin Vulnerabilities
Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple WordPress Plugin Vulnerabilities
Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple WordPress Plugin Vulnerabilities
Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple WordPress Plugin Vulnerabilities

sentences: Night Mode plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the &ntmode_page_setting[enable-me], &ntmode_page_setting[bg-color], &ntmode_page_setting[txt-color], and &ntmode_page_setting[anc_color] parameters to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victims Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victims cookie-based authentication credentials.

3xSocializer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.

ShortPixel Adaptive Images plugin for WordPress could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by broken access control. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to change the plugins settings.
